mapper.select: SELECT N_XH , N_CLLBXH , TO_CHAR(D_SQRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD') D_SQRQ , C_CLZK , N_CLXSZLC , C_SXRY , C_LXFS , TO_CHAR(D_DJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') D_DJ , C_CLBM , C_YHZID , C_YHID FROM B_CLWX WHERE N_XH = #{n_xh}

SELECT B_CLLB.C_CPHM C_CPHM, B_CLLB.C_PPXH C_PPXH, B_CLLB.C_ZRSJ C_ZRSJ, FUN_GET_DMMC('DEP',B_CLLB.C_YHZID) C_YHZID, TO_CHAR(B_CLWX.D_DJ,'YYYY-MM-DD') D_DJ, B_CLWX.C_CLZK C_CLZK, B_CLWX.C_SXRY C_SXRY, DECODE(B_CLWX.C_SHJG_F,'1','同意','0','不同意','等待审核') C_SHJG_F, DECODE(B_CLWX.C_SHJG_T,'1','同意','0','不同意','等待审核') C_SHJG_T FROM B_CLLB, B_CLWX WHERE B_CLWX.N_CLLBXH = B_CLLB.N_XH AND B_CLWX.N_XH = #{n_xh}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_CLWX( N_XH , N_CLLBXH , C_CLBM , D_SQRQ , C_SXRY , N_CLXSZLC , C_CLZK , C_LXFS , D_DJ , C_YHZID , C_YHID ) VALUES ( seq_b_clwx.nextval, #{n_cllbxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{c_clbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{d_sqrq,jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{c_sxry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{n_clxszlc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{c_clzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_lxfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{c_yhzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{c_yhid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE B_CLWX SET N_CLLBXH = #{n_cllbxh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, C_CLBM = #{c_clbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, D_SQRQ = TO_DATE(#{d_sqrq,jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD'), C_SXRY = #{c_sxry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_CLXSZLC = #{n_clxszlc,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, C_LXFS = #{c_lxfs,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE N_XH = #{n_xh}

UPDATE B_CLWX SET C_SFSH = '1',
D_SHSJ_F = SYSDATE, C_SHR_F = #{c_shr}, C_SHJG_F = #{c_shjg}, C_SHJG = DECODE(#{c_shjg},'0','00','1','01')
D_SHSJ_T = SYSDATE, C_SHR_T = #{c_shr}, C_SHJG_T = #{c_shjg}, C_SHJG = DECODE(#{c_shjg},'0','00','1','11')
WHERE N_XH = #{n_xh}
